title: Lynda - Enhancing iPhone Photos with Lightroom and Photoshop wit
description:
Lynda - Enhancing iPhone Photos with Lightroom and Photoshop with Bryan O'Neil Hughes 
1h 7m Beginner Jan 08, 2014 | Uploaded in Nov 8, 2014 by 2boweb
Subjects:Photography HDR iPhone, iPod, iPad 
Software:Photoshop Lightroom 
 
Apple's iPhone is one of the most popular cameras in the world. It delivers great results, but there's always room for improvement. In this course, Adobe Photoshop senior product manager Bryan O'Neil Hughes shares insights to help you import, organize, and enhance iPhone photos using Lightroom and Photoshop. The course begins with tips on getting the best possible quality when you shoot, then details strategies for importing and organizing photos using Lightroom.Ã¢â‚¬Â¨Ã¢â‚¬Â¨Next, Bryan explores Lightroom and Photoshop techniques aimed at working around the iPhone camera's limitations and making mobile photos look their best: enhancing dynamic range, correcting lens distortion, reducing noise and enhancing sharpness, and much more. Plus, learn how to create HDR images and panoramas, and even lift still images from video.
Topics include:

	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Sharpening
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Adding grain to hide artifacts
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Creating a collage from multiple images
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Employing selective focus and sharpening
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Generating still images from iPhone video clips
